name: Stardust Crusaders
description:
Stardust Crusaders is an episodic game created for Magic Girl Jam #4
Follow Pyra and Oceania through the jungles of Africa in search of the Heart of the Jungle, the world's hardest diamond. Throughout their journey they must face the perils of the jungle and of Stribog and his Golden Wind. Join them on an exciting adventure in Stardust Crusaders.
